==== Ubuntu Global Bug Jam - February 2009 ====

* Date: Friday, February 20th and Saturday, February 21st
* Time: 
** Friday: 7:30pm to approximately 12:00.
** Saturday: 10:00am to approximately 5:00pm.  Please arrive between 10:00am and 12:00pm.
* Location: '''<nowiki>[[http://centro.net/|Centro Corporate Offices]]</nowiki>''' 
* Address: <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=444+N.+Wells+Street,+Chicago,+IL&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=47.349227,79.101563&ie=UTF8&z=16&iwloc=addr&layer=c&cbll=41.890397,-87.634061&panoid=l9PyoV1RfjCj9SVtaR94TQ&cbp=12,215.33598331718235,,0,5|444 N. Wells St., Suite 305, Chicago, IL 60610]]</nowiki>
* Building Access:  
** You will need to buzz or call up to gain access to the building.  
** A flyer will be posted at the door to help out with the phone details
** In case you are having difficulty, dial 312-343-1427 and ask for Evan.  If that doesn't work, call 773-213-7907 and ask for Renaldo.

===== Event Goals =====

By particpating in the Ubuntu Global Bug Jam we're going to:
* learn about Ubuntu resources and workflows for reporting, triaging and fixing bugs, 
* report, triage and fix a lot of bugs, 
* bring together members of the Chicago free-software community,
* have fun.

The Level column indicate the difficulty of the bugs on the list for being Triaged, those are divided into three levels:
